Element.Name: UBL VersionID
Element.Description: Identifies the UBL version on which the transaction instance is based.

Element.Name: Customization identifier
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms

Element.Name: Profile identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the buyer to process the document in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: Order agreement identifier
Element.Description: A unique identifier for an order agreement.

Element.Name: Order agreement issue date
Element.Description: The date on which an order agreement was issued.

Element.Name: Order agreement issue date
Element.Description: The time of the day when the order agreement was issued.

Element.Name: Order agreement note
Element.Description: Free-form text applying to the order agreement.

Element.Name: Order agreement currency
Element.Description: The default currency for the order agreement.

Element.Name: Buyer reference identifier
Element.Description: An identifier assigned by the Buyer used for internal routing purposes.

Element.Name: Previous order agreement identifier
Element.Description: Element is mandatory in UBL. If no previousl order use word "NA".

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of a document.

Element.Name: Document description
Element.Description: Textual description of the document.

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: A Binary Object MIME code attribute MUST be coded using MIME Code Type version 2008 code list. An attached document embedded as binary object.

Element.Name: External document URI
Element.Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the external document is located.

Element.Name: Contact identifier
Element.Description: The identification of a contract.

Element.Name: Contract type
Element.Description: The type of a contract that is being referred to (such as framework agreement) expressed as a code.

Element.Name: Seller electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the seller's electronic address to which a business document may be delivered.

Element.Name: Seller party identification
Element.Description: An identifier for the seller that is issued by the party that sends the document in which the identifier is used.

Element.Name: Seller party name
Element.Description: The full (formal) name by which the seller is registered in the national registry of legal entities or persons.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is located.

Element.Name: Post Code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country such as region, county, state, province etc.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information.

Element.Name: Contact ID
Element.Description: Customer reference (“Your ref”) to be returned in the Invoice, e.g.Employee-no.

Element.Name: Contact point
Element.Description: The name of the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact fax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: Buyer electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the buyers electronic address to which the business document should be delivered.

Element.Name: Buyer customer account identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the buyer that is issued by the party that sends the document in which the identifier is used.

Element.Name: Buyer name
Element.Description: The full name of the buyer.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is located.

Element.Name: Post Code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: The subdivision of a country such as region, county, state, province etc.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country

Element.Name: Contact point
Element.Description: The name of the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact fax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: Originator identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the party that originally requested the ordered items.

Element.Name: Originator name
Element.Description: The name of the party that originally requested the ordered items.

Element.Name: Accounting customer identifier
Element.Description: A unique identifier of the accounting customer.

Element.Name: Accounting customer name
Element.Description: Accounting customer name.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The date when the period starts.

Element.Name: Period start time
Element.Description: The start time of the period.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date which the period ends.

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: The end time of the period.

Element.Name: Delivery party identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the party that carries out the delivery.

Element.Name: Delivery party name
Element.Description: The name of the party to which the goods and services are deliverd.

Element.Name: Buyer delivery terms
Element.Description: The terms that the buyer applies to the delivery the ordered items.

Element.Name: Delivery special terms
Element.Description: A description of special conditions relating to the delivery terms.

Element.Name: Delivery terms location
Element.Description: The location to which the delivery terms refer.

Element.Name: Address
Element.Description: Delivery address.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post Code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.

Element.Name: Allowance amount
Element.Description: The net amount of an allowance. ChargeIndicator = true means that AllowanceCharge amount is a Charge, ChargeIndicator = false means that AllowanceCharge Amount is an Allowance.

Element.Name: Allowance/Charge reason
Element.Description: The reason for the allowance, expressed as text.

Element.Name: Allowance/Charge amount
Element.Description: The net amount of an allowance. Value is allowance when ChargeIndicator = false. Value is charge when ChargeIndicator = true.

Element.Name: VAT total amount
Element.Description: The total VAT amount. The sum of all VAT category tax amounts.

Element.Name: VAT category taxable amount
Element.Description: Sum of all taxable amounts subject to a specific VAT category code and VAT category rate (if the VAT category rate is applicable).

Element.Name: VAT category tax amount
Element.Description: The total VAT amount for a given VAT category.

Element.Name: VAT category code
Element.Description: Coded identification of a VAT category.

Element.Name: VAT category rate
Element.Description: The VAT rate, represented as percentage that applies for the relevant VAT category.

Element.Name: VAT exemption reason text
Element.Description: A textual statement of the reason for why the base amount is exempted from VAT.

Element.Name: VAT category code
Element.Description: Coded identification of a VAT category.

Element.Name: Sum of line amounts
Element.Description: Sum of all line amounts in the document.

Element.Name: Total amount without VAT
Element.Description: The total amount of the document without VAT including all line net amounts minus sum of allowance amount on document level plus sum of charges on document level.

Element.Name: Total amount with VAT
Element.Description: The total amount of the document with VAT.

Element.Name: Sum of allowances on document level
Element.Description: Sum of all allowances on document level.

Element.Name: Sum of charges on document level
Element.Description: Sum of all charges on document level.

Element.Name: Paid amounts
Element.Description: The sum of amounts which have been paid a-priori.

Element.Name: Rounding of document level
Element.Description: Any rounding of the "Document total including VAT".

Element.Name: Amount due for payment
Element.Description: The outstanding amount that is requested to be paid.

Element.Name: Order agreement line identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for an individual line that is unique within an order agreement.

Element.Name: Order agreement line note
Element.Description: Free-form text applying to the order agreement line.

Element.Name: Ordered quantity
Element.Description: The number of item units that are ordered.

Element.Name: Order agreement line amount
Element.Description: Order agreement line amount.The total amount for the order agreement line, including all taxes except VAT.

Element.Name: Order agreement line amount
Element.Description: Order agreement line amount.The total amount for the order agreement line, including all taxes except VAT.

Element.Name: Accepted quantity
Element.Description: The number of item units that are delivered.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The date when the period starts.

Element.Name: Period start time
Element.Description: The start time of the period.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date when the period ends.

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: The end time of the period.

Element.Name: Item net price
Element.Description: The price of an item, exclusive of VAT, after subtracting item price discount.

Element.Name: Item price base quantity
Element.Description: The number of item units to which the price applies.

Element.Name: Item description as text
Element.Description: A free text detailed description of an item.

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: A name for an item.

Element.Name: Item sellers identifier
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the seller, for the item.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: An item identifier based on a registered scheme.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of a document.

Element.Name: Document description
Element.Description: Textual description of the document.

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: A Binary Object MIME code attribute MUST be coded using MIME Code Type version 2008 code list. An attached document embedded as binary object.

Element.Name: External document URI
Element.Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the external document is located.

Element.Name: Item classification code
Element.Description: A code for classifying the item by its type or nature according to the CPV commodity classification scheme. ListID = CPV.

Element.Name: Contracted item indicator
Element.Description: Indicates if the item is offered in accordance to an existing contract.

Element.Name: Item VAT category code
Element.Description: The VAT category code for the item.

Element.Name: Line VAT rate
Element.Description: The VAT percentage rate that applies to the line amount.

Element.Name: Item VAT category code
Element.Description: The VAT category code for the item.

Element.Name: Item property name
Element.Description: The name of the property

Element.Name: Item property classification code
Element.Description: Code for the item property according to a property code system.

Element.Name: Item property value
Element.Description: The value of the item property.

Element.Name: Item property unit of measure
Element.Description: The unit of measure in which the property value is stated, if relevant.

Element.Name: Item label name
Element.Description: The name of the product label.

Element.Name: Item label type
Element.Description: The label type such environmental, quality, social etc.

Element.Name: Item label value
Element.Description: The label value that applies to the item.

Element.Name: Item label reference
Element.Description: A reference to where the label specification can be found, e.g. a URI.
